dmca.title: DMCA Takedown Notification coral-calcium-supply.com Copyright Infringement

________________________________

From: Marwood Systems, LLC [mailto:marwoodsystems@cox.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2007 11:45 AM
To: Copyright
Cc: Abuse
Subject: Fw: DMCA Takedown Notification coral-calcium-supply.com
Copyright Infringement

 

I wanted to follow up with you about coral-calcium-supply.com

Thank you

 

 

----- Original Message ----- 

From: Marwood Systems, LLC <mailto:marwoodsystems@cox.net>  

To: abuse@theplanet.com 

Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2007 9:43 AM

Subject: DMCA Takedown Notification coral-calcium-supply.com Copyright
Infringement

 



8190 W. Deervalley Road.- Suite 104, #291 - Peoria, AZ 85382

Phone: 866-426-7252  -  FAX: 619-271-7396

Fax

To:

EV1Servers.net  theplanet.com
390 Benmar Drive
Suite 200
Houston, TX 77060
US
domainmanager@ev1servers.net

abuse@theplanet.com

+1. Fax: +1.

 

From:

Marwood Systems, LLC 

Exclusive World Wide Distributor

Tim Matson (Co-Owner)

Phone:

7133337873

 Phone:

   866-426-7252

FAX:

 7139429332

  Date:

5-21-2007

Re:

Demand of Immediate Take down Notice of Infringing Activity by your
client

 

   Email

 timmatson@cox.net <mailto:timmatson@cox.net>  

x Urgent       For Review      Please Comment    Please Reply   Please
Recycle

 

        Copyright Infringement Notice   

"CORAL CALCIUM SUPREME" 

Label Infringement

 

 

Brief Overview

Our Company Marwood Systems, LLC (Co-Owners: Timothy Paul Matson &
Virgil Duane Woods) retains the Exclusive World Wide Distribution Rights
to the FEDERALLY TRADEMARKED Nutritional Supplement called CORAL CALCIUM
SUPREME and the BOB'S BEST product line found at our Corporate Website
listed below. We also own the COPYRIGHT to our CORAL CALCIUM SUPREME
LABEL and all the other products that are part of the BOB'S BEST product
line. 

 

See link below for visual description and product photos

http://www.bobs-best-distributors.com/
<http://www.bobs-best-distributors.com/>  

 

Our ongoing DMCA Take Down efforts are documented at 

http://www.chillingeffects.org/notice.cgi?sID=2021

 

 

We have spent the last year enforcing our FEDERAL TRADEMARK by sending
cease and desist notices to over 100 distribution companies that were
advertising on the INTERNET and selling COUNTERFEIT CORAL CALCIUM
SUPREME & COUNTERFEIT BOB'S BEST PRODUCTS by copying our copyrighted
labels. 

 

The following company which has employed your company as its ISP
provider is buying counterfeit product from COUNTERFEIT MANUFACTURERS
and then selling the product to the American Consumer. Not only is this
a violation of our Federal Trademark, but these actions violate section
512 <http://www4.law.cornell.edu/uscode/17/512.html>  of the Copyright
law in Title 17 of the United States Code (Public Law No. 105-304, 112
Stat. 2860, 2877). 

 

 

(1) Infringing Company Information

 

Owner:   

 Coral Calcium Direct

Company:  

Coral Calcium Direct 

Address:

              Coral Calcium Direct
              6512 Six Forks Road
              Suite 502-B
              Raleigh, NC 27615
              US

               (2) Copyrighted work that has been infringed upon:

 

COPYRIGHTED LABEL

"The copyrighted works at issue is the "Coral Calcium Supreme Label"
which is the label used for our Federally Trademarked Product called
CORAL CALCIUM SUPREME(UPC code is 8 58442 00001) 



 

            

            (3) Infringing Web Pages: Demand for Immediate Take Down

 

http://coralcalcium-direct.com/

 

            (4). Copyright Owner Contact Information

 

Timothy P. Matson
Marwood Systems, LLC 

Exclusive World Wide Distributor

Bob Barefoot Product Line
8190 W.Deervalley Rd.
suite 104 #291
Peoria, AZ 85382
866-426-7252
www.bobs-best-distributors.com <http://www.bobs-best-distributors.com/>


timmatson@cox.net 






            

 

 

(5)  Statement of authority:

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law." "I swear, under penalty of
perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I
am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

 

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you
take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material
found at the links described above, and thereby prevent the illegal
reproduction and distribution of our Trademarked and Copyrighted
products via your company's network. Failure to do so will place you in
direct violation of section 512 of the Copyright law in Title 17 of the
United States Code resulting in possible legal actions against your
company as a co-defendant with your client.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. 

Please advise us regarding the actions you take. 

Timothy P. Matson

 

Signature of Authorized Party:
